Reviews.Title: Good enough for the price.
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: For the money it is an ok item to start off with. Only purchase if you could have the cameras set up no more than about 15 feet from area if you want to be able to get a good picture. Still haven't been able to set up with smartphone. But simple to set up to record to dvr.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the money.
Reviews.Author: Dean Dastardly
Reviews.Content: We had a run in with some dumpster bandits at work and needed to hire some protection. I won't go into detail about what happened, lets just say it wasn't pleasant. My boss figured instead of paying some dude $12 an hour to sleep we would just buy this system and rectify the situation the next time it happened.The bandit came back just like we thought it would... But this time, we caught it on film.Good work security system. You did well.
